import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./HomePage.css" import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; export default function HomePage() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const API_URL = `https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/search.php?s=` useEffect(() => { fetch(API_URL) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { console.log(response); setData(response.meals); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); }) },[]) return (
